post.body: I'm afraid it is so. Btw, I also implemented the no merry christmas policy this year.
I did enjoy the holiday TWIT very much. Listened twice. Thank you very much.
support irc channel is cool. Even if you don't get answers, having it open forces you to focus and helps solve the problem.
an open source smartphone, wiiiiii ! http://tinyurl.com/6d8s4o
still has a month to go before his exams at least. Plenty of time as I do not procrastinate anymore.
enjoyed this day very much.
B.B. King's Christmas songs, Black Tea with a drop of Rum, ... Glee !
Most of them are on facebook... but don't give away their e-mail address, that makes me dependant ! I don't like it at all.
Nightmarish ! Half of my Holiday Greetings e-mail come back to me 'cause the addresses are outdated... there's room for progress, here.
http://letmegooglethatforyou.com/ is really cool when you're bothered by someone who doesn't have the google reflex repeatedly
the adea website looks alright in more browsers than I first expected. Yay !
can anyone help me find colors that will go with #00b52c and won't make the eyes of the adea website's visitors bleed ??
just said i was going to bed and catched myself checking my rss feed reader. no no. i shut the computer now. really.
worked a little more on ADEA website redesign, probably going to finish it tomorrow. Need sleep now.
tired of working on the ADEA website redesign.
both sites which I said were down are up and running again. Yeeeahhh !
My website and @rudolf_kiefer 's are both down. That sucks ! Hope it doesn't last too long.
I just posted about @hodgman this morning http://tinyurl.com/62of97 and a few minutes later I received my copy of his latest book. :-)
Working on my very new and still unpolished weblog http://www.awkwardconnections.org/ .
had a great week-end. went back to Vevey (childhood town) and the mountains seemed very close almost oppressive this time.
